title: [aerospace] Concentration of Delays Among Specific Carriers

recommendations: Engage with KAL to understand and address delay causes

business_impact: Heavy reliance on a single carrier for operations can lead to increased vulnerability to delays and service disruptions.

title: [aerospace] Frequent Minimal Delays

business_impact: Poor management of shift patterns can lead to employee burnout and negatively affect operational efficiency.
